commitMessage:
@@@[WIP] Put the PDFAnnotationImporter under Test.  enhance FileAnnotationTab (#2640)

* updated outdated javadoc

* Refactored the PDF import using absolute paths prior import to make it testable

* Wrote some unit tests for the extraction of annotations from PDFs

* Added support for annotations with timezone in the date

*  Fix correct highlighting/shading of the TextAreas in the FileAnnotationTab

* * Added support for underlined text
* Fixed localization Issues

* Add test for polygons.  support for different date formats in the FileAnnotation and EntryAnnotationImporterTest

* Fixed reloading of annotations via the "Reload Annotations" button

* Use Collections.emptyList() to compare empty lists

* FileAnnotationCache logger is now on debug level instead of info

* Changed a test using Collections.singletonList(). It fails

* Use file.toPath() instead of Paths.get(file.toString())

* Flipped some .equals()

* Add equals method for test

* Deciding on the right test paradigm

* Introduced the FileAnnotationViewModel.  Changed AnnotationType to Enum

* Fixed localization.  refactored PdfAnnotationImporterTest

@@@Fixes #6357: File directory (#6377)

* Fixes #6357: File directory

Bug was introduced in https://github.com/JabRef/jabref/commit/1b03f039aa4abf0812a3a8ae0ba248c08fdb39a3.

* Fix tests

* Replace Paths.get

* Fix code style
